entries.title: Exclusive: Micron’s 1.5TB MicroSD card costs more than diamond
entries.description: World’s largest microSD card goes on sale at tech wholesalers but it's expensive

entries.title: At last, Xbox Series X co-op game Redfall has a release date
entries.description: Arkane's co-op shooter Redfall has been teased for the Xbox Series X for years, but it finally has a release date.

entries.title: Microsoft working on an overhaul for File Explorer to better fit Windows 11
entries.description: Reportedly releasing later this year, the new File Explorer aims to be more user friendly and further integrate Microsoft 365 apps.

entries.title: Hi-Fi Rush is the new rhythm game from The Evil Within dev – and it's not what I expected
entries.description: Tango Gameworks revealed rhythm-action game Hi-Fi Rush at the Xbox and Bethesda Developer Direct showcase.

entries.title: The new fastest mobile DRAM from SK hynix could power the future of AI
entries.description: SK hynix says it has the answer to speed up processing on your 5G smartphone, AR/VR tech, and more.

entries.title: Forza Motorsport shouldn't have got me this excited about dirt
entries.description: Forza Motorsport's attention to detail has me very excited for the simulation racer.

entries.title: Windows 11 could soon have a whole new way of organizing your files
entries.description: Could this Windows 11 update mean that this server-specific filing system is trickling into more devices?

entries.title: Android 14 could stop you from installing older apps – and that’s a good thing
entries.description: Android 14, which will launch later this year, will impose new restrictions on users looking to sideload apps built for old OS builds.

entries.title: VMware fixes four serious vRealize vulnerabilities
entries.description: Two have been given a 9.8 severity score, suggesting vulnerabilities that warrant urgent patching.

entries.title: I can't believe Age of Empires 2 is playable in a browser
entries.description: A console-friendly edition of Age of Empires 2 is coming to Game Pass, meaning the RTS classic will be playable in a browser.

entries.title: I wish I could buy this beautiful DualSense PS5 controller
entries.description: Sony sent out special edition PlayStation 5 DualSense controllers to its employees  – and they’re beautiful.

entries.title: The Lord of the Rings returns to Netflix very soon – but it might only be temporary
entries.description: Netflix has agreed a new deal to show Peter Jackson's award-winning fantasy film series on its platform once more.

entries.title: Zoom is bringing AI to live chat customer service
entries.description: Video conferencing giant believes Zoom Virtual Agent will efficiently deliver “better, faster” personalized customer support experiences.

entries.title: Redfall trailers, gameplay, and everything we know so far
entries.description: Redfall from Arkane Studios is coming exclusively to Xbox and PC in 2023. Here's everything we know about the co-op shooter so far.

entries.title: Thousands of WordPress sites at risk from online course plug-in flaw
entries.description: A patch for three major WordPress flaws is available, so patch now.

entries.title: 5 ways that ChatGPT will transform Microsoft Office
entries.description: Microsoft and OpenAI's multi-billion dollar partnership could transform Microsoft office apps – and make our lives a lot easier.

entries.title: I climbed 1,200+ steps every day for a month – and now I have quads of steel
entries.description: Here's what happened when I climbed stairs everyday for 30 days.

entries.title: Amazon's new drug prescription service is almost what the doctor ordered
entries.description: RxPass offers generic medication for a cheap price to Prime members in most of the United States.
